title: I Only Need To Attend The Classroom Of The Sage To Level Up! - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Cheats   Game Elements   Guilds   Level System   Male Protagonist   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Miki Nazuna   三木なずな
description: I got stronger by going to school. Whether by raising up to Level 2 or Level 99, it’s all the same. Every time the Sage’s magical classroom is attended, one can level up! In a world where the average level is 20, by reaching level 999, one can become the strongest!>
